email_body: Thanks, have a good time but no interest.. John David P Dupre 08/24/2000 05:00 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT, Mike Maggi/Corp/Enron@Enron cc: Subject: Tickets Every now and then, I receive complimentary tickets to Astros games at Enron field from various brokers or other contacts. If you would be interested in receiving them, let me know-- David 3-3528 Steno: 275
